description.value:
Requires two or more generators, place and activated or deactivated as a Full Action, which also activates any linked generators. Generates a wall of force 1.5m high and up to 8m long between linked generators in a line, acts as cover. If a Wall Section Overloads, only the section between two generators shuts down, the rest are unaffected.

Requirements

Cover is Force Field with Prot Rating of 65%

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
